弽字的基本解释

弽
shè
古同“韘”。

弽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shè］
［《廣韻》書涉切，入葉，書。］
［《廣韻》蘇協切，入帖，心。］
亦作“弽1”。
(1)古代射箭用具。象骨或晶玉制成，套在右手拇指上用以钩弦。也称玦、决，俗称扳指。
(2)见“韘”。
(3)通“渫”。疏通；疏浚。

弽字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【弓字部】　弽； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页360第20
【廣韻】書涉切【集韻】失涉切，?音攝。【廣韻】射決張弓。又童子佩之。　又【廣韻】呼牒切【集韻】悉協切，?音揲。義同。　又【玉篇】或作韘。【詩·衞風】童子佩韘。　【集韻】或作㢵。

弽字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
弽字的起名意思

暂无。

弽
Basic explanation of words
弽
shè
Ancient Tong "韘".
弽
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [shè]
["Guangyun" book involves cutting, entering leaves, book. ]
["Guang Yun" Su Xie cut, enter the post, heart. ]
Also known as "弽1".
(1) Ancient archery equipment. It is made of elephant bone or crystal jade, and is put on the right thumb for hooking strings. Also known as Jue and Jue, commonly known as pull finger.
(2) See "韘".
(3) Through "渫". Dredge; dredge.
弽
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji 2] [Bow Character Department] 　弽; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 360 No. 20
[Guang Yun] Book She-cut [Ji Yun] Loss She-cut,? Audio. [Guang Yun] Shoot the bow. And the boy wears it.　[Guang Yun] Hu Diqie [Ji Yun] Xi Xieqie,? Yin Ke. The same meaning.　[Jade Chapter] or Zuo Yun. 【Poetry·Weifeng】The boy Peiyun.　【Ji Yun】or Zuo 㢵.
